about_the_game:
You play as Alice, a young girl in the Panopticon, a dark and mysterious world where the rules of reality seem to bend in strange ways. You awaken in an unknown place with no recollection of any prior events or even who you are. The only thing you know is your name, and that you have to return back home.

The grotesque creatures and insane characters that inhabit this world are locked in an eternal cycle of madness, death, and rebirth. Learn snippets of truth from the ones that still retain some semblance of their own selves, and try to not suffer the same fate. Will you be able to recover Alice's memories and save her?

Explore the Panopticon:
Obtain new abilities and open your way through massive caverns, cyclopean structures and impossible landscapes in the world of the Panopticon.

Fight fearsome enemies:
Encounter powerful bosses in the form of Egregores, mysterious creatures with godlike powers.

Meet peculiar characters:
The Panopticon is full of deranged and strange creatures. Listen to their demands, and they may reward you.

Stop the corruption:
Fight the ruinous power that is corrupting and transforming the world.

Become a force of nature:
Amass power ups and become a force to be reckoned with.

  • Classic Metroidvania experience.
  • Focus on exploration with a great variety of environments.
  • Action combat and boss battles.
  • Hand drawn graphics.
  • Great story and characters.
  • A setting based on the works of Lewis Caroll and influenced by ancient esoteric traditions like Gnosticism or Hermeticism.
  • A big variety of unique abilities at your disposal.

MORE INFORMATION SOON!
Follow us on Twitter if you don't want to miss out!

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT1030
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Guide Alice, a young girl lost in an unfamiliar and dangerous world, in her quest to return home. In this 2D action-adventure metroidvania game you will meet peculiar characters, traverse a multitude of sceneries, and fight powerful beings known as Egregores to unravel the truth.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Spanish - Latin America
